title: we should give has a new skin???
body: just thinking about {{champion:157}} and why not a new skin got all 3 of them right now and he needs a new fresh look tell me your ideas on this i was thinking a bout arcade yasuo???

replies.body: No since he recently got a skin not to long ago.........
lol i ment to put we should give (yas) (not has) a new skin??? lolololol{{summoner:32}}
